name: CITY OF OREM UTAH
sampleDescriptions: Development of partnership between Library of Congress, American Folk Life Center, Center for Book and Orem Library's Center for Story.
Department of Interior, EPA, State and Tribal Assistance Grants (STAG) / water infrastructure matters; creation of a competitive STAG-like grant program.
Federal land use restrictions on Orem City parks
FY19 House and Senate HUD Appropriations report language regarding Economic Development Assistance Program;
FY18 and FY19 WIFIA loan funding and reauthorization.
